column1: 254413,Registered Nurse (Child and Family Health),,"Monitor patient progress or responses to treatments
column3: Analyse patient data to determine patient needs or treatment goals
column7: Explain medical procedures or test results to patients or family members
column9: Collect medical information from patients, family members or other medical professionals
column11: Evaluate patient functioning, capabilities or health
column13: Collaborate with health care professionals to plan or provide treatment
column15: Monitor patient conditions during treatments, procedures or activities
column17: Administer anaesthetics or sedatives to control pain
column19: Advise others on health care matters
column23: Provide medical care for children and for families
column25: Train patients, family members or caregivers in techniques for managing disabilities or illnesses
column27: Treat acute illnesses, infections or injuries
column29: Operate diagnostic or therapeutic medical instruments or equipment
column35: Administer health care or medical treatments
column37: Interact with patients to build rapport or provide emotional support
column41: Maintain inventory of medical supplies or equipment
column43: Examine medical instruments or equipment to ensure proper operation
column45: Prepare medical supplies or equipment for use
column47: Examine patients to assess general physical condition
column51: Communicate health and wellness information to the public
column53: Administer blood or other fluids intravenously
